name: Screencap Animation
description:
This model is based on the 2d animation art style that was heavily influenced from the 1980's to 90's, the (The Silver Age of American Animation). The model has been trained on images from the movie "Anastasia" 1997.

The unique token you should include in your prompt is "Zwxthej" in order to emphasize the art style.

Example: "A cat sitting in a chair, Zwxthej"

The model is very hit or miss, it can produce beautiful results but it requires trial and error.

A good and detailed prompt is recommended to achieve the best results

meta.prompt: a man sitting in a garden, vest with apron, highly detailed, Zwxthejx , 1900s, animated cartoon, gorgeous lighting, illuminated
meta.negativePrompt: bad anatomy, blurry, undefined shapes, ugly, disfigured, bad quality, low quality, merged legs, deformed, hideous

meta.prompt: a black woman, ((old and elderly)), vest with apron, highly detailed, Zwxthejx , 1900s, animated cartoon, gorgeous lighting, illuminated
meta.negativePrompt: bad anatomy, blurry, undefined shapes, ugly, disfigured, bad quality, low quality, merged legs, deformed, hideous, young woman, tiara

meta.prompt: an asian woman, ((old)), evening gown, highly detailed, Zwxthejx , 1900s, animated cartoon, gorgeous lighting, illuminated
meta.negativePrompt: bad anatomy, blurry, undefined shapes, ugly, disfigured, bad quality, low quality, merged legs, deformed, hideous, young woman, tiara

meta.prompt: a cats head, a ((cat)) sitting in a chair, highly detailed 1900s, animated cartoon, gorgeous lighting, illuminated
meta.negativePrompt: bad anatomy, blurry, undefined shapes, ugly, disfigured, bad quality, low quality, merged legs, deformed, hideous, woman

meta.prompt: a cat sitting in a chair, highly detailed, cwitrbvcxz , 1900s, animated cartoon, gorgeous lighting, illuminated
meta.negativePrompt: bad anatomy, blurry, undefined shapes, ugly, disfigured, bad quality, low quality, merged legs, deformed, hideous
